Author: mattjaynes
Content:
Looks great. I've admired jQuery from afar since watching John Resig's talk on it a few months ago (links below).

One thing I'd love to ask those of you who have used both js libraries: Other than the file size difference, what do you see as the main advantages of jQuery over prototype/scriptaculous?

John Resig Part I: http://video.yahoo.com/video/play?vid=410472

John Resig Part II: http://video.yahoo.com/video/play?vid=412541

Author: hello_moto
Content:
This reminds me of a conversation I had with one of the Microsoft VPs. When asked about Google free lunch and recruiting tactics, he replied: "That's the culture in Silicon Valley. What's frightening is that people come and go within 2-3 years"

These googlers came to my school and advertising how proud they are working at Google. Now we know the truth (^_^).

Author: davidw
Content: It has some interesting possibilities, but as a hypothetical Google or Facebook developer, I'd much rather be hacking on something like Android than the Facebook API.
